sentences.en: A written or printed symbol used for punctuation ; a punctuation mark.
sentences.cn: 我们的老师对标点符号非常重视.

sentences.en: By establishing the relations between words, punctuation establishes the relations between the people using words.
sentences.cn: 标点建立起词与词之间的关系, 从而建立起用词人之间的关系.

sentences.en: Check and double-check spelling and punctuation.
sentences.cn: 要反复检查拼写和标点符号。

sentences.en: He was known for his poor grammar and punctuation.
sentences.cn: 他不通语法和乱用标点是出了名的。

sentences.en: It includes punctuation, writing, history, in error in such areas as research.
sentences.cn: 其中包括标点 、 文字 、 史实 、 时误等方面的考证.

sentences.en: Language Arts Songs that Teach English Grammar , Punctuation, and Spelling.
sentences.cn: 用歌曲来教孩子们拼音书写.

sentences.en: Marks were given for accurate spelling and punctuation.
sentences.cn: 因拼写及标点正确而得分。
我儿子的标点符号很糟糕.

sentences.en: Our teacher is very fussy about punctuation.
sentences.cn: 我们老师对标点符号十分挑剔。

sentences.en: Punctuation is the way one bats one's eyes, lowers one's voice or blushes demurely.
sentences.cn: 标点就像人眨眨眼睛,低声细语, 或伍犯作态.

sentences.en: Punctuation, then, is a matter of care.
sentences.cn: 由此说来, 标点符号又是个要谨慎从事的问题.

sentences.en: She is always meticulously accurate in punctuation and spelling.
sentences.cn: 她的标点和拼写总是非常精确.

sentences.en: Still others describe the sequence as a book full of letters with no words or punctuation.
sentences.cn: 还有另外一些人把这些序列描绘成一部不分单词也无标点符号的满篇字母的书.

sentences.en: The children have never been taught punctuation.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子从未学过使用标点符号.

sentences.en: There were also three lines of penciled characters with the new - style punctuation: " Attention!
sentences.cn: 又有新式标点的铅笔字三行: “ 注意!

words.tran_cn: 不时打断；强调；加标点于

trans.tran_cn: 标点法，标点符号，标点符号的使用，点标点
trans.tran_en: the marks used to divide a piece of writing into sentences, phrases etc
